text:
It’s a warm winter evening in Beverly Hills. The sun sets on Wilshire Boulevard and the glimmer of lights that’s coming through the Neiman Marcus windows matches the twinkling bulbs wrapped around the towering palms outside. Inside, well-dressed patrons shuffle through racks, stroll the tree-adorned halls, slip on hats and gloves and enjoy their last sips of rosé at the Bar on 4 before ringing an Uber and bringing their goodies home.

It’s easy to get sucked in. The vibe at Neiman’s is intoxicating, especially during the holiday season. On the first floor, Erika Girardi—better known as dazzling pop icon, alter-ego Erika Jayne—is eyeballing every glittering heel on the Balenciaga display and reminiscing about her life before the spotlight. She recalls her first big Neiman’s purchase, a carefully-chosen pair of Gucci shoes. “They were black platforms,” she says. “I knew they would go with everything.”

Girardi has come along way from that moment. Her shopping style now? She lets out a wild laugh: “Jeez, I run through here like a maniac! I know what I want, I know my sizes and I rarely return things. To be able to shop in a place like this is pure luxury.” She picks up a pair of sparkling, lightning-bolt adorned Balmain ankle boots and grins.

Watch the video above to see if Girardi is able to control herself when she has Neiman Marcus Beverly Hills all to herself on one very unforgettable night.
title: Watch Erika Jayne’s Unexpected—And Unforgettable—Night at Neiman’s
